name: Craft Shop
description:
Open your Craft Shop and create unique items for your customers! Use various tools and materials to turn your handmade item into a piece of art. Take a new order each time, earn money and upgrade your DIY workshop. Play dynamic and fun puzzles to get the inspiration for further creations. And don’t forget to have fun!


CARVE and POLISH a piece of wood into a given shape!

PAINT your work using various colors!

STENCIL the item to turn it into the masterpiece!

SOLVE addictive puzzles with challenging obstacles!
